title: The Miraculous Mellops. Part 3
creator_credit: Millenium Pictures, Posie Graeme-Evans and Karl Zwicky
brief_description: Ralph uses the time-travel vacuum cleaner and returns to the Age of Dinosaurs. The Moon flowers are multiplying and making money for the nursery, but Bill Mellops still does not realise that Jane and Ralph are from the Moon. Harmony and Michael travel to the Moon in the combi, and on their return Mr. Dump steals the van with the intention of using the Moon as a waste dump.
